law.catch_line: Property is not subject to property tax if the property:...
law.text:
Property is not subject to property tax if the property:
is owned by:
a national organization of veterans of the United States armed services; or
any department, State or local unit, chapter, branch, or post of a national organization of veterans of the United States armed services, including:
the 29th Division Association of World War I; or
the Society of the Cincinnati of Maryland; and
is necessary for and actually used exclusively for the purposes of any of these organizations.
